review: I am pleased with this device although I haven't yet had time to read all of the instructions to determine all the ways to use it.  It does allow the watching of a movie or tv series from Prime to be cast onto your TV from your tablet running series 2.0 and above.  My Fire is version 4.  I'm not sure this is an advantage, however, since I can watch the same thing without my tablet being involved.  I also have Roku 2 which isn't as versatile, but is about 2 years old and has more available apps.  I think the Fire TV will eventually be better, and I just wanted to have all Amazon devices to take advantage of their compatibility designs.  However, I did not read the sales pitch/advertisement carefully enough as I thought I would be able to cast internet content from my tablet to the TV screen.  The HD will not allow that; the  HDX is required.  As noted in the product title this was a refurbished unit - I highly recommend looking for such items on electronic gear - I have saved a lot of money and haven't yet been disappointed.
